short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple to-do list as a Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tasky is your new simple to-do list in Chrome, giving you what you need in a to-do list and nothing more or less. 

You'll never have to struggle finding .txt notepad files on your computer anymore, because you are a click away from writing down your tasks in this super small but handy extension.
 
- Write down your thoughts, notes and tasks within the same browser screen.
- Edit your tasks when needed, without having to add and/or delete.
- Remind yourself of your progress by marking completed tasks as checked.
- The task list saves itself and will remain intact on every browser reload and/or restart.
